name: static-site-formation
description: Helpers for static sites built with Contentful or from the file system

scripts.build: npx tsc --module commonjs --outDir cjs/ && npx tsc --module esnext --outDir esm/ && npx tsc --module commonjs --esModuleInterop --outDir lib/

author: Graciela Alaniz (https://alanizcreative.com/)
